long_description: Keep the liquid in your water bottle within easy reach and at the perfect sipping temperture with the Cool Stuff insulated sack. A draw string and toggle secure your liter size, wide-mouth bottle into this nylon-covered neoprene pouch. The sturdy webbing handle and D-ring offer a variety of ways to carry the pouch or attach it to your pack.
short_description: Keep the liquid in your water bottle within easy reach and at the perfect sipping temperture with the Cool Stuff insulated sack.
